messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

wrong name sent wrong name maybe ad info hi guys trying put issue but seems name changed instead automatically fills with funny cannot change can you please investigate fix can properly add tickets without having mails replied with hi we solved your issue thanks manager
